starters.name: Iberian Ham Croquettes
starters.description: Creamy and crispy homemade croquettes filled with high-quality Iberian ham.

starters.name: Tomato and Buffalo Mozzarella Bruschetta
starters.description: Toasted bread topped with fresh diced tomatoes, buffalo mozzarella, basil, and extra virgin olive oil.

starters.name: Buffalo Chicken Wings
starters.description: Marinated and fried chicken wings, coated with a spicy Buffalo-style sauce, served with blue cheese dressing and celery sticks.

starters.name: Beef Empanadas
starters.description: Baked empanadas filled with seasoned beef and vegetables, served with tomato sauce.

starters.name: Crispy Onion Rings
starters.description: Breaded and fried onion rings served with aioli sauce.

starters.name: Summer Rolls
starters.description: Delicate Vietnamese rolls filled with fresh vegetables, aromatic herbs, and shrimp, served with peanut sauce.

starters.name: Nachos with Guacamole
starters.description: Crispy nachos topped with melted cheese, guacamole, beans, and spicy sauce.
